meanings.sent1: The amboynas provide shade in the hot climate.
meanings.sent2: I saw many amboynas while walking through the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys love to swing from the branches of the amboynas.
meanings.sent4: The amboynas stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the amboynas danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The fruit of the amboyna tree.
meanings.sent1: The amboynas were ripe and ready to be picked.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the sweet taste of the amboynas.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels raced to gather the fallen amboynas.
meanings.sent4: The amboynas glistened like rubies in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly picked amboynas filled the air.

meanings.definition: A reddish-brown wood from the amboyna tree.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman carved intricate designs into the amboynas.
meanings.sent2: The furniture was made from polished amboynas.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous beavers used the amboynas to build their dam.
meanings.sent4: The amboynas gleamed with a rich, warm hue.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the freshly cut amboynas lingered in the workshop.
